abilitygroupdescription.p: Represents training the ability to use maces, clubs, flails, morning stars, virges, and improvised club-like weapons in combat.

abilitydescription.p: Characters equipped with a mace or similar weapon can attempt to disarm an opponent or remove their shield.
If the attack is successful an opposed Strength check is made. If the opponent fails they drop their weapon or shield.
Characters equipped with a Mace or similar weapon can strike with it during combat doing weapon damage.

The character swings the mace wildly keeping their opponents at bay. When attacked the character makes a free willpower check against the first opponent that attacks them in a round. If successful the opponent loses their attack, being unable to approach. If the willpower check is not successful the character makes a free attack against the opponents defence before the opponents attack.

ability:mace.parry When a character is attacked they may attempt to parry the blow using their weapon instead of making an armour roll. If the parry check succeeds the attack does no damage. If the parry result fails and a boon is rolled the attack deals half damage. If the parry result fails and a bane is rolled the attack deals double damage.
